SUMMARY:
Knihcentrum.cz offers a comprehensive range of delivery options within the Czech Republic, including home delivery, an extensive network of parcel shops and lockers, and free in-store pickup at their KNIHCENTRUM.POINT locations. 
DELIVERY PROVIDERS: Home delivery is handled by Balíkovna na adresu, Zásilkovna, DPD, and PPL. Parcel shop and locker services are provided by Balíkovna, Zásilkovna (including Z-BOXes), DPD Pickup, and PPL (Parcelshops and Parcelboxes). 
PRICING: In-store pickup is free. Parcel shop/locker delivery ranges from 59 Kč to 79 Kč depending on the provider and weight. Home delivery costs between 89 Kč and 99 Kč. A consistent free shipping threshold of 999 Kč applies to all paid delivery methods. The cash on delivery (COD) surcharge is a flat 36 Kč for all applicable services. 
NOTABLE FEATURES: The website provides a wide selection of major carriers. There is no specific information on delivery timeframes, express delivery options, or bulky item shipping. Weekend pickup is mentioned as a possibility for DPD Pickup points. 
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is clearly presented on a single, dedicated 'Ceny dopravy' page. All costs, providers, and conditions are easy to find and understand. The lack of specific delivery time estimates is the only minor omission.
